javadoc:
Editor Panel for displaying and editing options associated with importing or exporting. It takes
 in a list of Options and generates editors for each of them on th fly.

methods.name: <init>

params.name: options
params.comment: the list of options to be edited.

params.name: addressFactoryService
params.comment:
a service for providing an appropriate AddressFactory if needed
 for editing an options.

name: OptionsEditorPanel
